title: Relief on horizon for southeast Australia after record heatwave delivers 50C
desc: For the eighth consecutive day, Australia's southeast inland will bake in temperatures well above 40 degress Celsius.

title: Cristiano Ronaldo Scores Again As Al-Nassr Moves Within 3 Points Of Top Spot In SPL
desc: Cristiano Ronaldo got on the scoresheet and Joao Felix was the star of the show as Al-Nassr earnt a fourth straight Saudi Pro League victory in a 3-0 win at Al-Kholood.

title: Nearly all schoolgirls to get HPV injection before Form 4
desc: This will cost the ministry Sh414.4 million over the next five years

title: Nvidia halted plans to invest US$100 bil in OpenAI
desc: Nvidia Corp’s negotiations to invest as much as US$100 billion (RM394.2 billion) in OpenAI have broken down, The Wall Street Journal (WSJ) reported, exposing a potential rift between two of the most powerful companies in the artificial intelligence (AI) industry.

title: BBQ explosion on NSW south coast leaves four people in hospital
desc: A﻿ barbeque explosion on NSW south coast has left four people in hospital, including two children.

title: Charity founder Yas Daniel Matbouly charged over alleged sexual assault, rape
desc: The 50-year-old founder of the Serving Our People charity, headquartered on the Gold Coast, has been charged with more than 50 offences following investigations into multiple allegations of sexual assault.

title: Toni Collette reveals which catchphrase she still hears from her 'life-changing' role
desc: Toni Collette opens up about her career-changing role in "Muriel's Wedding" at Sundance.

title: Nvidia halts plan to invest $100 billion in OpenAI, WSJ says
desc: The companies announced the agreement in September, saying at the time that they had signed a letter of intent for a strategic deal. The $100 billion was meant to support new data centers and other AI infrastructure, built with Nvidia components.

title: 6 Missing as Search Continues for Boat Off the Coast of Massachusetts
desc: Searchers recovered one body after the Lily Jean, a 72-foot fishing vessel, issued an emergency alert on Friday morning, the U.S. Coast Guard said.

title: Rose breaks his 36-hole record at Torrey Pines, Koepka makes it to the weekend
desc: Justin Rose scored even better on the notorious South course Friday in the Farmers Insurance Open, and the proof is in the tournament record book. He broke his own 36-hole record by two shots at Torrey Pines to build a four-shot lead.
